TopicTitle: Steampunk kerbal Stream in 10 minutes. 6.4:1 scale.

Articles.Content: Stream over. And I just realized I posted this in General Discussion instead of Fanworks. That's what I get for having more than one KSPforum tab open at a time.
So, do you have any specific goals for the next stream?
No. I stream whenever I feel like it about whatever I feel like.

I meant goals for what to do in the next stream. What is the key to cotnrol the DRE settings ingame? Also, I can't find the 6.4x config for Astronomer's visual pack and I don't remember what you said the planet textures you were using are.
